refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Write lines consisting of the sequentially corresponding lines from each FILE, separated by TABs, to standard output. With no FILE, or when FILE is -, read standard input.
Mandatory arguments to long options are mandatory for short options too.

listitem.para: reuse characters from LIST instead of TABs
paste one file at a time instead of in parallel
GNU coreutils online help: <http://www.gnu.org/software/coreutils/> Report paste translation bugs to <http://translationproject.org/team/>

refsect1.title: AUTHOR
refsect1.para: Written by David M. Ihnat and David MacKenzie.

refsect1.title: SEE ALSO
refsect1.para: The full documentation for paste is maintained as a Texinfo manual. If the info and paste programs are properly installed at your site, the command
should give you access to the complete manual.
